item.title: Educational Assessment: Formal Education Shelved
item.description:
Educational Assessment: Formal Education Shelved

Summary: Considered accounting/study; identified language/time costs as gates. Pivoted to immediate job search + targeted certs.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batch 2

item.title: Asymmetric Warfare, Not Healing
item.description:
Asymmetric Warfare, Not Healing

Summary: Foundational decision: treat life reconstruction as asymmetric warfare against a 31-year deficit, not ‘healing’. Victory is a managed, sovereign life.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batches 4–5

Notes
